info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued November 27 at 1:36AM EST until November 27 at 7:00PM EST by NWS Marquette MI
info.description:
* WHAT...For the Winter Storm Warning, heavy snow. Additional snow accumulations between 1 and 3 inches. Winds gusting as high as 35 mph. For the Winter Weather Advisory, lake effect snow expected. Total snow accumulations between 2 and 4 inches.
* WHERE...Southern Houghton County.
* WHEN...For the Winter Storm Warning, until 7 AM EST this morning. For the Winter Weather Advisory, from 7 AM this morning to 7 PM EST this evening.
* IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. The hazardous conditions will impact any holiday travel today.
info.instruction:
Slow down and use caution if you must travel. If you do travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. Prepare for possible power outages.
During lake effect snow, the weather can vary from bands of locally heavy snow to dry weather just a few miles away. Visibilities can also vary greatly. Be prepared for rapid changes in weather, visibility, and road conditions.

parameter.value: WINTER STORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 7 AM EST THIS MORNING... ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 7 AM THIS MORNING TO 7 PM EST THIS EVENING
